step1.title: Sign Up
step1.description: Create your account in minutes with a simple registration process.

step2.title: Deposit
step2.description: Fund your account using cryptocurrency or other payment methods.

step3.title: Choose Plan
step3.description: Select an investment plan that matches your goals and risk tolerance.

step4.title: Earn
step4.description: Watch your investment grow with our AI-powered trading strategies.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does the AI trading bot work?
faq.a1: Our AI trading bot uses advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze market trends, news, and historical data to make informed trading decisions 24/7.
faq.a2: Yes, we use bank-grade security measures including encryption, two-factor authentication, and blockchain verification for all transactions.
faq.a3: The minimum investment varies by plan, starting from $100 for our Starter plan.
faq.q4: How do I withdraw my earnings?
faq.a4: You can withdraw your earnings at any time through your dashboard. Withdrawals are processed within 24 hours.
faq.a5: We currently support USDT (Tether) and Bitcoin for deposits and withdrawals.

footer.description: Professional cryptocurrency trading platform powered by advanced AI algorithms.
footer.riskWarning: Trading cryptocurrencies involves significant risk and may not be suitable for all investors. Past performance is not indicative of future results.

deposit.title: Deposit Funds
deposit.subtitle: Add funds to your investment account
deposit.sendCrypto: Send your crypto to this address
deposit.txHashOptional: Optional but helps speed up approval
deposit.processingNote: Deposits are processed within 24 hours after blockchain confirmation. Make sure to send only {{currency}} to the address below.
deposit.submittedDesc: Your deposit request has been submitted and is pending admin approval.
deposit.fixErrors: Please fix the errors before submitting

withdraw.title: Withdraw Funds
withdraw.subtitle: Request a withdrawal from your account
withdraw.autoProcessNote: Withdrawals are automatically processed after 24 hours. Admins may approve earlier. Make sure your wallet address is correct - transactions cannot be reversed.
withdraw.confirmationFeeNote: Before your withdrawal can be approved, you must pay a 10% confirmation fee to verify your transaction. The fee must be paid in the same currency as your withdrawal.
withdraw.afterSubmitting: After submitting your withdrawal request, send the 10% confirmation fee to the appropriate address above. Once the fee payment is confirmed on the blockchain (6+ confirmations), an admin will approve your withdrawal within 24 hours.
withdraw.confirmationFeeNote2: You must pay a {{fee}} confirmation fee separately to the {{currency}} address shown above before your withdrawal can be approved. This fee verifies your transaction on the blockchain.
withdraw.latestRequests: Your latest withdrawal requests with blockchain tracking
withdraw.completeFeePayment: Complete your withdrawal by paying the {{percent}}% confirmation fee
withdraw.payFeeNote: Pay the confirmation fee to the address below using {{currency}} before your withdrawal can be processed.
withdraw.enterFeeHash: Enter the transaction hash of your fee payment
withdraw.fixErrors: Please fix the errors before submitting
withdraw.createdDesc: Please submit your {{percent}}% confirmation fee payment (${{fee}}) to proceed.
withdraw.feeSubmittedDesc: Your withdrawal will be processed within 24 hours.
withdraw.enterFeeHashError: Please enter the fee payment transaction hash

chat.title: Live Support
chat.welcomeMessage:
Hello! ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to Win Trade Invest support.

How can I help you today?

You can ask about:

â€¢ Investment plans
â€¢ KYC verification
â€¢ Account issues

Or just type your question!

responses.greeting: Hello! ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to Win Trade Invest support. How can I help you today?
responses.withdrawal:
For withdrawals:

1. Go to Dashboard â†’ Withdraw
2. Enter amount and wallet address
3. Pay the 10% confirmation fee
4. Withdrawals are processed within 24 hours

Minimum withdrawal: $50

Need more help? Email us at support@win-tradex.com
responses.deposit:
To make a deposit:

1. Go to Dashboard â†’ Deposit
2. Choose USDT (TRC20) or BTC
3. Send crypto to the provided wallet address
4. Submit deposit request with transaction hash

Minimum deposit: $250

Deposits are processed within 24 hours after blockchain confirmation.
responses.investment:
We offer 3 investment plans:

ðŸ“ˆ Starter: $250-$4,999 (5-8% ROI)
ðŸ“Š Growth: $5,000-$24,999 (8-12% ROI)
ðŸ’Ž Professional: $25,000-$100,000 (12-18% ROI)

All plans run for 30 days with our AI trading bot.

Go to Dashboard â†’ Investments to get started!
responses.kyc:
KYC Verification:

1. Go to Profile & KYC
2. Fill in your personal details
3. Upload a government-issued ID
4. Submit for verification

Note: A $400 verification fee applies upon approval.

Verification takes 24-48 hours.
responses.fees:
Platform Fees:

â€¢ KYC Verification: $400 (one-time)
â€¢ Withdrawal Confirmation: 10% of withdrawal amount
â€¢ Platform Fee: 20% of profits

All fees are clearly shown before any transaction.
responses.contact:
Contact us:

ðŸ“§ General Support: support@win-tradex.com
ðŸ“§ Live Support: live@win-tradex.com
ðŸ“§ Admin: admin@win-tradex.com

Our team typically responds within 24 hours.
responses.problem:
Sorry to hear you're having issues. Please:

1. Try refreshing the page
2. Clear your browser cache
3. Check your internet connection

If the problem persists, email us at support@win-tradex.com with:
â€¢ Your account email
â€¢ Description of the issue
â€¢ Screenshots if possible
responses.account:
Account issues:

â€¢ Forgot password? Use 'Forgot Password' on login page
â€¢ Account locked? Contact support@win-tradex.com
â€¢ Can't login? Clear browser cookies and try again

Need more help? We're here for you!

4. Earn bonus when they deposit

No limit on referrals!
